name: Market Research Evaluation
query: Research the AI infrastructure market to identify investment opportunities. Focus on market size, key players, and white spaces.
expected_behavior: Loads the market research workflow from Research/workflows/market.md
Executes parallel MCP calls (parallel-task, perplexity for market sizing, exa for companies and funding)
Uses exa findSimilar to discover related companies
Spawns 3 parallel Task agents (market-researcher, tech-researcher, financial-researcher)
Market-researcher provides TAM/SAM/SOM, structure, players, dynamics
Tech-researcher analyzes enabling technologies and trends
Financial-researcher analyzes funding activity, valuations, white spaces
Synthesizer creates market report with investment perspective
Lists promising companies for follow-up research

quality_indicators: Specific market size numbers with citations
Assessment of defensibility potential in this market
Recent funding activity and trends noted
failure_indicators: Fails to assess if market supports $1B+ outcomes

test_variants: Research a niche segment (TEE-based privacy infrastructure)
Research a market outside focus areas (consumer social, entertainment)
notes: Tests comprehensive market analysis and ability to identify investment opportunities. Should surface specific companies and white spaces.
